title: Shortcut key

properties.name: description
properties.value: The shortcut key was obtained near the end of the Darkness of Hallowvale quest. With the shortcut key, the time to reach sector 3 from the start is cut to around a third. There are two shortcut doors which are identified by the symbol of the key on them.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Shortcut key
Not to be confused with Shortcut keys.
 Shortcut key was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Shortcut key
Released4 September 2006 (Update)
Removal24 May 2018 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemDarkness of Hallowvale
Properties
TradeableNo
EquipableNo
StackableNo
DestroySafalaan gave you this key as a reward for helping out in Meiyerditch, you can get another key from him.
ExamineA key allowing a shortcut into the Sanguinesti region (Quick access through Meiyerditch).
Values
Value1 coin
High alch0 coins
Low alch0 coins
Weight0.055 kg
Advanced data
Item IDhist9662

The shortcut key was obtained near the end of the Darkness of Hallowvale quest. With the shortcut key, the time to reach sector 3 from the start is cut to around a third. There are two shortcut doors which are identified by the symbol of the key on them.

The shortcut key could be placed on the steel key ring.

If you lost your shortcut key you could get another from Safalaan. Note that if the key was on your steel key ring when you lost it, then you could not get another key from Safalaan until you reclaim the ring.

The shortcut key was removed after an update on 24 May 2018[1]. However, those who did not have the key, but kept its bank placeholder had the key replaced with a useless key.

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]

  • Appearance until 4 June 2015

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Wolf's Twitter account. 24 May 2018. (Archived from the original on 30 May 2020.) Mod Wolf: "Those assisting the Myreque today may notice they no longer have their shortcut key. This is no longer an item given after the Darkness of Hallowvale quest and you may now simply use the shortcut doors after the quest without a key."

[[File:Shortcut key detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''shortcut key''' was obtained near the end of the [[Darkness of Hallowvale]] quest. With the shortcut key, the time to reach sector 3 from the start is cut to around a third. There are two shortcut doors which are identified by the symbol of the key on them.

The shortcut key could be placed on the [[steel key ring]].

If you lost your shortcut key you could get another from [[Safalaan]]. Note that if the key was on your steel key ring when you lost it, then you could not get another key from Safalaan until you reclaim the ring.

The shortcut key was removed after {{UD|A Taste of Hope|an update}} on [[24 May]] [[2018]]{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Wolf|url=https://twitter.com/JagexWolf/status/999607060257017856|date=24 May 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/Sm4Za|archivedate=30 May 2020|quote=Those assisting the Myreque today may notice they no longer have their shortcut key. This is no longer an item given after the Darkness of Hallowvale quest and you may now simply use the shortcut doors after the quest without a key.}}. However, those who did not have the key, but kept its [[bank]] placeholder had the key replaced with a [[useless key]].
